verbs.description: [ARG1: Shares of major US automakers] [V: fell] [ARGM-LOC: in early trading] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday morning] [ARGM-TMP: after President Donald Trump asked his administration to draw up a new list of $ 200 billion worth of Chinese imports to hit with a 10 % tax] .

Shares of major US automakers fell in early trading Tuesday morning after [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: asked] [ARG2: his administration] [ARG1: to draw up a new list of $ 200 billion worth of Chinese imports to hit with a 10 % tax] .

Shares of major US automakers fell in early trading Tuesday morning after President Donald Trump asked [ARG0: his administration] to [V: draw] up [ARG1: a new list of $ 200 billion worth of Chinese imports] [ARGM-PNC: to hit with a 10 % tax] .

Shares of major US automakers fell in early trading Tuesday morning after President Donald Trump asked [ARG0: his administration] to draw up a new list of $ 200 billion worth of Chinese imports to [V: hit] [ARG1: with a 10 % tax] .
